Additional forms: Also Gondi_Trmaipōmy father;mī-āpōthy father; Gondi_Ko (Su.)tappe(his, her) father

Also Gondi_Maavval(pl.avvasku) mother; Gondi_Lavālmother; Gondi_Trmaiwalmy mother (lit. our mother);mīwalthy mother (lit. your mother);awhāṛīmother, dam of man or beast; Gondi_Phavhā̆rīid. (for-harisee 2357)
Also Gondi_Mu caus.hunjih-; Gondi_Muhuskaṛsleep; Gondi_Elwinhuskār, Gondi_Mauskaṛ,uskanḍid.

Notes: Gondi_Maur̨ve tallahasu-probably due to specific accent/reduction reasons.
The change*-m->-b-in some dialects is probably due to assimilation. However, initial retroflex inḍubais probably misspelled.
The formēt-goes back to*ēn-t-; however, Gondi_Lerpānāis probably not related.

Additional forms: Also Gondi_Tr, Gondi_Ph, Gondi_Chd fem.raiyā; Gondi_L fem.leyā; Gondi_Ma fem.leya(pl.-sk); Gondi_Ko fem.lēydaṛ, (T)ledāḍi;Gondi_A (Su.) fem.ḍiyyā; Gondi_A (SR)lehmīyouth

Also Gondi_W, Gondi_Phkaitālbitter; Gondi_Trkehkebitter; Gondi_Mukaylebitter;kaymul burkabitter gourd; Gondi_Kokaymulbitter; Gondi_Lkayārraw, unripe; Gondi_Kokay-kaṭbile; Gondi_A (Su.)kaymūlbitterness
Also Gondi_Ma caus.miṛʔ-to turn over, invert
Also Gondi_Amiṛc-to lighten; Gondi_A (Su.)miṛc-to glitter;miṛcvallightning; Gondi_Lu_Smeersheetattalightning; Gondi_Mamiṛŋgor̨spark; Gondi_A (Su.)minŋūṛspark

Also Gondi_Trmuṛhuttānāto plunge (tr.); Gondi_Wmuriānā(sun) to set; Gondi_Ph caus.murīsahtānā,murahtānā; Gondi_Mmuṛndānāto sink, be drowned; Gondi_Ko (Su.)mu-to immerse (tr.); Gondi_A (Su.)muḍḍūŋ-to be immersed;muḍḍūs-to immerse

Notes: The formnarkalis probably influenced by SDRnari.

Additional forms: Also Gondi_Snōṭ-to twine (rope); Gondi_A (Su.)nōṛerope, bowstring;nōṭ-to entwine
Also Gondi (many dial.)undione; Gondi_Luncāone or other
Also Gondi_Mupaŋ, in:paŋ vīnahkthe whole night

Word: pehenā, pehetānā "to lift up, pick up"
Additional forms: Also Gondi_A (SR)perrānāto gather; Gondi_Trpehkānāto pick up; Gondi_Wpahkānāto glean, Gondi_Phpahkānāto choose; Gondi_Mpehkānāto lift, pick; Gondi_S, Gondi_Kopehk-, Gondi_Mapeʔk-to pick up

Also Gondi_Kopermapriest; Gondi_FHpersa pēnhighest god of the Gonds; Gondi_Kopeddalheadman of village; (Su.)pedeyālfather's elder brother; Gondi_Kopers-to grow, grow up; caus.persp-; Gondi_Abers-, Gondi_Mubars-to grow; Gondi_Mpersānāto extend
Also Gondi_Mpoīsmoke; Gondi_Mupoy-to smoke (intr.); Gondi_A (Su.)poyyūs-to season (curry)
Also Gondi_Trsārksix each; Gondi_W, Gondi_Phsarne(W) fourth day after tomorrow, (Ph) sixth day
Also Gondi_Mdehānāto break (tr.); Gondi_Ldekhanāto tear, rend
Many dialects have:ṭanḍ-,ṭenḍ-,tenḍ-to take out, take off, remove
Also Gondi_A (Su.)teh-to rouse from sleep, revive to life; Gondi_Trtēḍānāto rise, (other dialects)tēd-id.
Also Gondi_W, Gondi_Phuccahtānāto cause to sit; Gondi_Aupis-, Gondi_A (SR)uppūs-, Gondi_Trupsuhtānā, Gondi_Muupih-, Gondi_Maupʔ-, Gondi_Supcah-to make to sit
Also Gondi_Trwarhuttānā,warīstānāto frighten;waṛhūcarscarecrow; Gondi_Marey-to be afraid; Gondi_Lrepīhfear; Gondi_A (Su.)verēfear
Notes: The bisyllabic character of the root caused the metathese*veri->*vre->*re-in several dialects.
